newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - October 22.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - October 22.

text.p: The following stories was reported in Tuesday's Daily Variety:

HOLLYWOOD - John Hegeman, former senior vice president of marketing and distribution for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Inc /UA Distribution Corp, has moved to Metromedia Entertainment Distribution as executive vice president of marketing.

HOLLYWOOD - Chris Adelmann has been named senior vice president of Warner Bros International Theatres of Time Warner Inc, taking a newly created position as the division continues to expand in Europe and Asia.

HOLLYWOOD - Just how Viacom Inc will incorporate the 50 percent of USA Network it doesn't already own into its holdings and who at MCA Inc of Seagram Ltd will run the Sci-Fi Channel are two of the key issues the companies will face if the proposed settlement to their legal battles goes through.
LONDON - Miramax International of Walt Disney Co has sealed an 11-picture deal with South Korean automotive and consumer electronics giant Hyundai through Hyundai subsid Diamond AD.
